product_meta.title: IMAGE Skincare Clear Cell Salicylic Gel Cleanser, 6 oz
product_meta.description:
This fresh, foaming cleanser lathers away excess oil and sebum without stripping moisture from the skin. Salicylic acid gently exfoliates dead skin cells, purifies clogged pores and reduces the appearance of blemishes. Formulated with an innovative peptide-based complex that targets problem areas without irritating. Purifying plant ingredients like neem leaf extract and tea tree oil help to ease irritation and keep pores clear. Skin feels smooth and soft, not dry and tight.Paraben-free.

BRAND STORY
IMAGE Skincare is a clean and professional line backed by clinical results. Created by an esthetician, formulated by a plastic surgeon, IMAGE is dedicated to helping its customers Age Later.
